Measures of output and production

```{r output, echo = FALSE, fig.cap='Output Exhibits Both Growth and Cycles', out.width='80%', fig.asp=.75, fig.align='center'}
jobs <- tq_get("GDPC1", 
                 get = "economic.data",
                 from = Sys.Date() - lubridate::years(25))
jobs %>% ggplot(aes(date,price)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Dollars", title = "GDP Per Capita", color = "Series")
```
